div.p: Year 31, Choiak 13. The memorandum given to Phileas by Kleon in Krokodilon Polis. To Phileas. I happen to [be ...] physically unwell, and I can not conduct any of the [works]. Could you please order [...] to go to [...].
Year 3[1 ...]. Translation: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 128, Â© Peeters
